flawed_nl_solution:
The total amount of money used to charge the debit card is 1/2*$5000 = $10000/1<<1/2*5000=10000/1>>10000/1.
When he buys the used car, he still has $10000/1 - $1500 = $8500<<10000/1-1500=8500>>8500 left.
#### 8500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2500, not 10000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
